name: Whip
description: Wide arc attack in aim direction. Pierces and knocks back.

name: Garlic Aura
description: Damages enemies in a ring around you.

name: Throwing Stakes
description: Fires straight shots; upgrades add ricochet and pierce.

name: Bat Swarm
description: Orbiting projectiles shred nearby enemies.

name: +Damage
description: Increase all outgoing damage.

name: +Fire Rate
description: Shoot faster.

name: +Move Speed
description: Move faster.

name: +Pickup Radius
description: Collect XP gems from farther away.

name: +Max HP
description: Increase max HP and heal some.

name: Neon Reflex Booster
description: Cyberware feedback loops boost movement speed.

name: Sandevistan Burst
description: Time dilation lets you fire significantly faster.

name: Mono-Edge Filament
description: Razor monowire tuning increases weapon damage.

name: Chrome Lungs
description: Augmented lungs improve sprint pacing.

name: Synaptic Cache
description: Neural cache smooths target acquisition and cadence.

name: Daedric Tempering
description: Heavier forged strikes hit much harder.

name: Dragonbone Greaves
description: Legendary armor craft quickens your stride.

name: Warding Rune
description: Arcane runes reinforce vitality.

name: Thu'um Focus
description: Battle shouts sharpen relentless offense.

name: Nightingale Step
description: Silent assassin footwork boosts mobility.

name: Adrenal Surge
description: Roguelike momentum spikes your attack speed.

name: Blood Price
description: Risk-reward doctrine grants raw damage.

name: Lucky Find
description: Treasure hunter instinct increases XP pickup reach.

name: Shadow Dash
description: Evasive chaining increases move speed.

name: Berserker Dice
description: High-roll aggression improves damage and fire rate.

name: Ghost Protocol
description: Cloaked routing improves movement and looting lanes.

name: Overclocked Coils
description: Weapon coils vent hotter plasma volleys.

name: Railgun Kinetics
description: Stability tuning pushes shot throughput.

name: Black ICE Shell
description: Defensive ICE bolsters max HP.

name: Street Samurai Drill
description: Combat drills improve precision and pace.

name: Frostbite Oil
description: Nord alchemy adds ruthless impact.

name: Stalhrim Heart
description: Ancient ice steel reinforces your life force.

name: Companion Bond
description: Shield-brother grit sustains your journey.

name: Rift Runner
description: Portal-hopping instincts increase movement speed.

name: Arc-Light Sigil
description: Mystic sigils sharpen offensive spellwork.

name: Void Pouch
description: Pocket dimensions vacuum XP from afar.

name: Grim Contract
description: Dark pact grants power at relentless tempo.

name: Last Stand Doctrine
description: Survivor grit adds durability and healing.

name: Kinetic Stride

name: Headhunter Routine
description: Chain kills tune your offensive output.
